atom3d.util package¶

Submodules¶

atom3d.util.file module¶

File-related utilities.

atom3d.util.file.find_files(path, suffix, relative=None)¶

Find files in path, with given suffix.

Optionally can specify path we want to perform the find relative to.

atom3d.util.file.get_pdb_code(path_to_pdb)¶
atom3d.util.file.get_pdb_name(path_to_pdb)¶

atom3d.util.formats module¶

Methods to convert between different file formats.

atom3d.util.formats.bp_from_xyz_dict(data, struct_name='structure')¶

Construct a biopython structure from xyz data (stored in a dict).

atom3d.util.formats.bp_to_df(bp)¶

Convert biopython representation to pandas dataframe representation.

atom3d.util.formats.combine_sdfs(sdf_files, big_sdf)¶

Concatenate several SDF files into one.

atom3d.util.formats.df_to_bp(df_in)¶

Convert dataframe representaion to biopython representation.

atom3d.util.formats.df_to_bps(df_in)¶

Convert dataframe representation to biopython representations.

atom3d.util.formats.get_bonds_list_from_mol(mol)¶

Extract bonds from a molecule. Bond types are encoded as double:

single bond (1.0) double bond (2.0) triple bond (3.0) aromatic bond (1.5).

Args:

mol (Mol): a molecule in RDKit format

Returns:

bonds_df (pandas dataframe): list of bonds

atom3d.util.formats.get_bonds_matrix_from_mol(mol)¶

Provides bond matrix from a molecule. Bond types are encoded as double:

single bond (1.0) double bond (2.0) triple bond (3.0) aromatic bond (1.5).

Args:

mol (Mol): a molecule in RDKit format

Returns:

connect_matrix (2D numpy array): connectivity matrix

atom3d.util.formats.get_connectivity_matrix_from_mol(mol)¶

Generates the connection matrix from a molecule.

Args:

mol (Mol): a molecule in RDKit format

Returns:

connect_matrix (2D numpy array): connectivity matrix

atom3d.util.formats.get_coordinates_from_df(df)¶
atom3d.util.formats.get_coordinates_of_conformer(mol)¶

Reads the coordinates of the conformer

Args:

mol (Mol): Molecule in RDKit format.

Returns:

xyz (float array): Coordinates

atom3d.util.formats.is_mmcif(f)¶

If file is in mmcif format.

If file is in pdb format.

If file is in mmcif format.

If file is in sdf format.

If file is in sharded format.

atom3d.util.formats.is_xyz(f)¶

If file is in xyz format.

atom3d.util.formats.merge_dfs(dfs)¶
atom3d.util.formats.mol_to_df(mol, add_hs=False, structure=None, model=None, ensemble=None, residue=999)¶

Convert Mol object to dataframe format (with PDB columns)

atom3d.util.formats.read_any(f, name=None)¶

Read file into biopython structure.

atom3d.util.formats.read_mmcif(mmcif_file, name=None)¶

Load mmcif file in to biopython representation.

atom3d.util.formats.read_pdb(pdb_file, name=None)¶

Load pdb file in to biopython representation.

atom3d.util.formats.read_pdb_gz(pdb_gz_file, name=None)¶
atom3d.util.formats.read_sdf(sdf_file, name=None, sanitize=False, add_hs=False, remove_hs=False)¶
atom3d.util.formats.read_sdf_multi(sdf_files, name=None, sanitize=False, add_hs=False, remove_hs=False)¶
atom3d.util.formats.read_sdf_to_mol(sdf_file, sanitize=False, add_h=False, remove_h=False)¶

Reads a list of molecules from an SDF file.

Args:

add_h (bool): Adds hydrogens. Default: False remove_h (bool): Removes hydrogen. Default: False sanitize (bool): Tries to sanitize the molecule. Default: False

atom3d.util.formats.read_xyz(xyz_file, name=None, gdb=False)¶

Load xyz file in to biopython representation.

atom3d.util.formats.read_xyz_to_df(inputfile, gdb_data=False)¶

Read an XYZ file (optionally with GDB9-specific data)

atom3d.util.formats.split_df(df, key)¶
atom3d.util.formats.write_mmcif(out_file, structure)¶

Write a biopython structure to an mmcif file.

atom3d.util.formats.write_pdb(out_file, structure, **kwargs)¶

Write a biopython structure to a pdb file.

atom3d.util.rosetta module¶

class atom3d.util.rosetta.Scores(data_path)¶

Bases: object

Track and lookup Rosetta score files.

Args:
data_path (Union[str, Path, list[str, Path]]):

Path to silent files.

remove_missing(file_list)¶

Remove examples we cannot find in score files.
